data.text:
On the third line of the text, who is "retainer" 
referring to? Special Week-san?
data.name: Teacher
data.processed:
󠁿On the third line of the text, who is "retainer" 
󠁿referring to? Special Week-san?

data.text: Eh? Ah, yes! ……yes?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? Ah, yes! ……yes?

data.text: …"myself", it's referring to "myself".
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿…"myself", it's referring to "myself".

data.text:
Yourself……? Aaah! 
Yes, it's King-chan!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Yourself……? Aaah! 
󠁿Yes, it's King-chan!

data.text: That's not what I meant!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: 󠁿That's not what I meant!

data.text: Special Week-san, King Halo-san, extra homework for both of you.
data.name: Teacher
data.processed: 󠁿Special Week-san, King Halo-san, extra homework for both of you.

data.text:
Fuu～, thanks for the meal～. 
Really, yams are the best, aren't they～?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Fuu～, thanks for the meal～. 
󠁿Really, yams are the best, aren't they～?

data.text: Spe-chan, are you okay…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Spe-chan, are you okay…?

data.text:
Ah, No! There's nothing wrong! Forget about that, 
before my food gets cold I need to eat!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, No! There's nothing wrong! Forget about that, 
󠁿before my food gets cold I need to eat!

data.text: …h-huh?! My food's completely gone?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿…h-huh?! My food's completely gone?!

data.text: No, didn't you just wolf it down and finish way faster than me…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿No, didn't you just wolf it down and finish way faster than me…?

data.text: Alright, let's get started with today's training!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, let's get started with today's training!

data.text:
Heck yeah! If Spe's showing us that she's this motivated, 
we need to put in some spirit too, don't we?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿Heck yeah! If Spe's showing us that she's this motivated, 
󠁿we need to put in some spirit too, don't we?!

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! If she's going to wear her Race Uniform during 
training, it's pretty obvious how serious Spe-chan is!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, yeah! If she's going to wear her Race Uniform during 
󠁿training, it's pretty obvious how serious Spe-chan is!

data.text: Racing Uniform……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Racing Uniform……?

data.text: Ah?! I put on the wrong clothes!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Ah?! I put on the wrong clothes!

data.text:
It was a mistake?! 
It's a mistake?!
data.name: Both
data.processed:
󠁿It was a mistake?! 
󠁿It's a mistake?!

data.text: Spe-chan……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Spe-chan……

data.text: Looks like you spoke to Spe about going overseas.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Looks like you spoke to Spe about going overseas.

data.text:
Yeah, yesterday night. 
She was really shocked though……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, yesterday night. 
󠁿She was really shocked though……

data.text:
Looks like I don't even need 
anymore explanation for why she's so flustered.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿Looks like I don't even need 
󠁿anymore explanation for why she's so flustered.

data.text:
I had heard from Silence Suzuka that she 
wanted to head overseas around New Year's.
data.processed:
󠁿I had heard from Silence Suzuka that she 
󠁿wanted to head overseas around New Year's.

data.text:
Seeing her like this, it was easy to see that her victories in 
the Twinkle Series had made her curious about the challenges that 
would await her overseas.
data.processed:
󠁿Seeing her like this, it was easy to see that her victories in 
󠁿the Twinkle Series had made her curious about the challenges that 
󠁿would await her overseas.

data.text:
Since she was aiming even higher, as a Trainer, I had no reason 
to stop her, I should cheer her on as best I can, though―
data.processed:
󠁿Since she was aiming even higher, as a Trainer, I had no reason 
󠁿to stop her, I should cheer her on as best I can, though―

data.text:
To part ways with Suzuka-san who's been with 
her since she transferred, it's not unexpected 
that she'd be so shaken, however…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿To part ways with Suzuka-san who's been with 
󠁿her since she transferred, it's not unexpected 
󠁿that she'd be so shaken, however…

data.text: ……Um, Trainer-san……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿……Um, Trainer-san……

data.text:
Silence Suzuka's expression clearly showed she 
felt like she was responsible. However, she has 
her own feelings to think about as well―
data.processed:
󠁿Silence Suzuka's expression clearly showed she 
󠁿felt like she was responsible. However, she has 
󠁿her own feelings to think about as well―

data.text:
I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team 
and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team 
󠁿and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.

data.text:
I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team 
and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team 
󠁿and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.

data.text:
Alright, since Spe is already in her Racing Uniform, today let's 
have everyone do training today in their Race Uniforms!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, since Spe is already in her Racing Uniform, today let's 
󠁿have everyone do training today in their Race Uniforms!

data.text:
Fufuu, that sounds like fun, doesn't it? They'll probably say 
is starting something weird again, though.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, that sounds like fun, doesn't it? They'll probably say 
󠁿is starting something weird again, though.

data.text:
Suzuka-san… supporting Uma Musume so they can take hold 
of their dreams, is what team is all about.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿Suzuka-san… supporting Uma Musume so they can take hold 
󠁿of their dreams, is what team is all about.

data.text: Supporting, so they can take hold of their dreams……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Supporting, so they can take hold of their dreams……

data.text:
Well then, Suzuka-san let's change in to our Racing Uniforms too. 
Let's get you properly fired up for your overseas adventure.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿Well then, Suzuka-san let's change in to our Racing Uniforms too. 
󠁿Let's get you properly fired up for your overseas adventure.

data.text: ……Yeah, you're right.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿……Yeah, you're right.

data.text: I'll go see all of that "scenery" too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿I'll go see all of that "scenery" too.

data.text: Alright then, let's finish up with one more lap.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: 󠁿Alright then, let's finish up with one more lap.

data.text: Fuu～, today we ran quite a lot too!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: 󠁿Fuu～, today we ran quite a lot too!

data.text: Everyone, good work……
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Everyone, good work……

data.text: Haa…… haa…… haa…… haa……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa…… haa…… haa…… haa……

data.text:
(Suzuka-san's running, it hasn't changed 
from when I first saw it……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿(Suzuka-san's running, it hasn't changed 
󠁿from when I first saw it……)

data.text:
(I want to become like Suzuka-san too…… 
That's why, I wanted to see more of Suzuka-san's running)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿(I want to become like Suzuka-san too…… 
󠁿That's why, I wanted to see more of Suzuka-san's running)

data.text: (…… but, Suzuka-san is going overseas……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿(…… but, Suzuka-san is going overseas……)

title: In Short, What Does That Mean?
